transformers_text: 11 Samurais Who Are Eager to Die and an Elusive Samurai Transliteration Shin it a gari to Nig e J zu Japanese Yoshihiro Hiram in e Ri no Yamazaki Yoshihiro Hiram in e September 21 2024 2024 09 21 It is April and the time has come for the wheat harvest Kiyo hara Shinano no kami the provincial official of Shinano confiscates all the grains production from the villagers killing anyone who oppose him In response Hoshi na Yas a bur leads a revolt against Kiyo hara in Kawa nakajima despite knowing that there is no chance for him and his retainers to survive Yo rishi ge sends Toki yuki Koji r Ge nba and Fub uki as messengers to convince Yas a bur to retreat but to no avail Certain that Yas a bur would be easier to convince after the initial skirmish with Kiyo hara's forces led by Wada Yone maru and Suke f usa Toki yuki and the others assist Yas a bur 's forces in battle reducing casualties to a minimum At night a drunk Toki yuki has a heated discussion with Yas a bur and finally convinces him to retreat with the women and children However Yas a bur 's retreat plans are intercepted by Suke f usa's hearing and Kiyo hara orders to give chase and eliminate them Anticipating this the Elusive Warriors begin their strategy to allow Yas a bur and his retainers to successfully retreat
